thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Binjiang Real Estate Group's Controlling Shareholder Increases Stake In The Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Binjiang Real Estate Group's Controlling Shareholder Increases Stake In The Company

organizations.name: hangzhou binjiang real estate group co ltd
brief-hangzhou binjiang real estate group's controlling shareholder increases

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hangzhou Binjiang Real Estate Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HAS BOUGHT 2.0 PERCENT STAKE IN THE COMPANY BETWEEN JAN 11, 2016 AND FEB 7, 2018 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2shFClv Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
